rows.label: qst701001_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, it's you folks. You've been
quite active lately, it seems.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0002
rows.name:
You finally made an escape
ship? It's become quite the
topic of conversation.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0003
rows.name:
Is that in a good way?
Or another meaning?

rows.label: qst701001_msg0004
rows.name: Hahaha, you're sharp.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0005
rows.name:
Of course, many people are grateful.
Everyone values their life. We want
to be prepared for emergencies.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0006
rows.name:
But there are those who have no choice but to
stay in this capital, and those who choose to
stay. I want to address their needs too.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0007
rows.name:
...It's not about "wanting
to," mo. We will absolutely
do something, mo!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0008
rows.name:
Morumo is the representative of this
shopping ward, mo. I have a duty to
protect everyone's mornings and nights, mo.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0009
rows.name:
Therefore! I thought of this by
skipping a little bit of my
packed meetings every day, mo!!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0010
rows.name:
What Morumo and the others need now
is! An impregnable shelter, mo!!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0011
rows.name: ...Was it okay to skip the meetings?

rows.label: qst701001_msg0012
rows.name:
I have an excellent secretary, so
it's not a problem, mo! ...Besides,
that's not important right now, mo!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0013
rows.name:
Well, the point is we're talking about
building a shelter in this capital.
We'd like to borrow your strength.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0014
rows.name:
To build a shelter, we need a
carpenter's help, mo. First,
let's get Zain involved, mo!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0015
rows.name: Zain? That name sounds familiar...

rows.label: qst701001_msg0016
rows.name:
Isn't he Rita-san's father?
You know, when they were
naming the Zain's Waytree--

rows.label: qst701001_msg0017
rows.name: Oh, you know Rita? As expected.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0018
rows.name:
Zain is indeed Rita's father. He's one
of the best craftsmen in this shopping
ward, but he's a bit difficult...

rows.label: qst701001_msg0019
rows.name:
Fuffuffu, no worries, mo. Morumo and
Zain are also walking buddies, mo.
He'll surely cooperate happily, mo!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0020
rows.name:
All right. We'll try talking
to Zain-san anyway.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0021
rows.name: This is unusual. Are you alone today?

rows.label: qst701001_msg0022
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0023
rows.name:
Don't go too far out of
your way. Milt will surely
be a pain, you know?

rows.label: qst701001_msg0024
rows.name:
Well, we'll be going
too. See you later!
